wolf ≈ dog

wolf ≈ worgh Würger

𒌨𒆠 ʷur-ki urki ka5 kuon "dog" 𒌨𒂠 ʷur-gir15 urgir (domestic) dog "Würger"

*wĺ̥kʷos ⇔ Ulk ⇔ lustige List fox

𓃢 𒁇𒁀𒊒 bar-ba-ru ⇔ humbaba 𒄷𒉿𒉿 𒄷𒌝𒁀𒁀 Huwawa ⇔ Bes 𓁲

white, silver, gray

*wĺ̥kʷos lykos "wolf" ⇔ welk, light

greed, lunch & hunger

𒅗𒌅𒊭𒁇𒁀𒊒 hunger pangs

𓋴 𓄜 𓃀 𓃤 stupid ( vs fox !)

wolf 𒁺𒈠 duma; du-ma tëme dumm ⇔ 𒌨𒁇𒊏 barbaru бирӕгъ biræǧ brege "wolf"
wolf 𒁺𒈠 duma dumb ذِئْب ḏiʾb דֵּיבָא dêḇā Depp du-ip (ass) dìga
wolf 𒁺𒈠 duma δumb скуммьп skummʹp scum (Abschaum) तोडेल्ली tōḍēl‍lī Dödel Töle Tollpatsch
